advancements.reclaimed.aspect.phoenix.ro: Reckless flame-chasers who thrive on danger
advancements.reclaimed.aspect.remnant.ro: Past, is where it is stuck, well... sometimes
aspect.reclaimed.dragonkin.colossal.desc: They are absolutely massive! Meaning they are difficult to kill, jump higher, attacks knockback things further while also reaching further, but attacks themselves are slower and they find it difficult to fit in places...
aspect.reclaimed.dragonkin.description: Colossal, winged dragon creatures unnaturally bound to a humanoid body. Their existence is unstable, a miracle in itself.
aspect.reclaimed.dragonkin.draconic_wing: They have a unique set of wings that are much more durable then normal and provide armor by themselves! Unlike a normal Elytra, they can also hold Sneak mid-flight to descend slower.
aspect.reclaimed.dragonkin.dragon_head_a: Wearing a Dragon Head provides them with additional defences and health while increasing their attack damage even further. While this is impressive, reminder that they barely have any armor in that scenario!
aspect.reclaimed.frostling.cold_feet.des: When they attempt to walk on water or lava while sneaking, they freeze water or create basalt from lava, creating a surface to be walked on.
aspect.reclaimed.frostling.description: Dancer of Ice and very vocal haters of the hot.
aspect.reclaimed.frostling.fire_vulnerab: They take significantly more damage while On Fire, as their skin melts away under the heat.
aspect.reclaimed.frostling.frost_invigor:
Freezing does no damage, but instead benefits them!
While Freezing, their attack damage and movement speed increase, and if completely frozen, they also gain regeneration.
aspect.reclaimed.frostling.ice_ballerina: Nothing outmatches Frostling when they are on Ice. The denser the ice, the faster they move.
aspect.reclaimed.frostling.temperature_s:
They already possess lower health, and different climates affect them heavily.
Hot biomes leave them sluggish and weakened, while cold biomes make them agile and powerful.
aspect.reclaimed.pebblemite.bug_structur:
Being bug-like, they are vulnerable to the Bane of Arthropods enchantment. They are very tiny, hard to catch, but have very low health.
Their limbs are so short that they can't reach far or deal much damage.
aspect.reclaimed.pebblemite.description: Born from the stone, seeks the stone, their bug like form makes them hard to catch, but also becomes their biggest weakness.
aspect.reclaimed.pebblemite.feels_like_h:
They thrive when in contact with stone-like blocks but become homesick when not touching them.
While touching stone-like blocks, they move faster, mine much faster, and attack somewhat faster.
When not touching stone-like blocks, they move significantly slower, mine considerably slower, and attack slightly slower.
aspect.reclaimed.phoenix.adrenaline_rush: As they are more hurt and even more so when at death's door, they become much more agile, tougher and harder to kill overall. Better to finish the job quickly then let them take back control.
aspect.reclaimed.phoenix.description: Drawn to the heat of risk like moths to a torch, they gamble boldly while sometimes burning, sometimes blazing brighter than any other.
aspect.reclaimed.phoenix.flaming_feather: Winged with shimming feathers akin to living flames. Though they're more fragile than ordinary ones, their structure allows them to recover faster.
aspect.reclaimed.phoenix.reckless_descen: They are immune to Fire and Lava and take no fall damage if in Lava. However they land harder than most, receiving more damage from falling in other locations.
aspect.reclaimed.remnant.description: Rediscovered forgotten parts coalesced into one physical body.
aspect.reclaimed.remnant.gravity_control: They can manipulate the strength of gravity around them, feeling lighter by default, and increasing gravity's pull when crouched.
aspect.reclaimed.remnant.gravity_restruc: Their bodies have adapted to ever-shifting gravitational forces, becoming larger, durable, and more resistant to being pulled down by normal gravity.
aspect.reclaimed.remnant.spatial_displac: When struck, unstable gravity around them may tear space briefly, randomly displacing their body elsewhere.
aspect.reclaimed.voidborne.description: The Void, heavy, dense, dark and hungry. It can swallow entities whole within it's emptiness.
aspect.reclaimed.voidborne.gravitational: When sneaking, they can pull items toward themselves using their gravity.
aspect.reclaimed.voidborne.singularity.d: Their bodies have too much mass for their smaller-than-usual body, causing them to experience stronger gravity, take more damage from falls, and move more slowly overall.
aspect.reclaimed.voidborne.spatial_insta: Their body is too unstable to touch. When struck by a melee attack, there is a slight chance for the attacker to be slightly displaced.
death.attack.empowered.item: %1$s failed to empower themselves against %2$s using %3$s
item.reclaimed.aspect_picker.tooltip: Select your Aspect from Reclaimed with this book
item.reclaimed.faded_relic.dragonkin.lor: You swear it rumbles like a distant roar...
A relic, once heavy with draconic pride...
Scales long gone, but their memory lingers...
It smells faintly of charred stone and sky...
item.reclaimed.faded_relic.frostling.lor: You could swear a breeze eminated from it...
item.reclaimed.faded_relic.pebblemite.lo: It rattles softly with loose stones...
The earthy scent of tunnels clings to it...
A relic stubborn as stone, small but enduring...
It remembers the comfort of underground halls...
item.reclaimed.faded_relic.phoenix.lore_: A radiant heat can be felt...
It will come back at some point...
item.reclaimed.faded_relic.remnant.lore_: A forgotten echo of something broken...
Faded fragments cling to its shape...
An incomplete thing, desperate to matter...
Even in loss, it remembers purpose...
item.reclaimed.focus.frostling.use_resul: Turn the ice under your feet denser
item.reclaimed.focus.pebblemite.use_resu: Teleport a small distance, passing through stone-like blocks
item.reclaimed.focus.phoenix.use_conditi: When used outside Lava with %s or more Health:
When used outside Lava with less then %s Health:
item.reclaimed.focus.phoenix.use_result_: Damage self for %1$s Health, gaining %2$s for %3$s seconds
Damage self to %1$s Health, gaining %2$s Absorption Health with %3$s for %4$s seconds
Launch into the air while gaining %1$s for %2$s seconds
item.reclaimed.focus.remnant.use_result_: Save a teleport location for later use
Teleport to the saved location while saving your current one
item.reclaimed.focus.voidborne.use_condi: When used in Main Hand while not Sneaking:
When used in Main Hand while Sneaking:
When used in Off Hand while not Sneaking:
When used in Off Hand while Sneaking:
item.reclaimed.focus.voidborne.use_resul: Store a non-powerful entity within you
Summon the selected stored entity back
Summon all the stored entities back
item.reclaimed.shattered_relic.dragonkin: Ash clings to the cracks of this broken relic...
A dying ember smolders in its heart...
You feel a roar that never comes...
Its power was torn apart in battle...
item.reclaimed.shattered_relic.frostling: Glass pieces can be confused for ice...
Very hard to hold its slippery surface...
Dusts of ice engulfs the relic...
item.reclaimed.shattered_relic.pebblemit: Dust spills from its broken stones...
Once sturdy, now shattered in hand...
Crumbled pebbles hum one last song...
item.reclaimed.shattered_relic.phoenix.l: It might not come back this time...
item.reclaimed.shattered_relic.remnant.l: Broken pieces of a broken thing...
The fragments hum with incomplete sorrow...
It craves wholeness it will never find...
item.reclaimed.shattered_relic.voidborne: It's hunger was, never to be satiated
Particles still try to pull each other...
